#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	long long int n,count=0;
	cin>>n;
	char str[n];
	cin>>str;
	long double x,y,z;
	cin>>x>>y;
	z=x;
	for(int i=1;i<n;i++)
		{
			if(str[i]!=str[i-1])
			{
				z=x;
			}
			else
				z+=x;
			if(z>y)
			{
				count=1;
				break;
			}
		}
	if(count==0)
		cout<<"YES";
	else 
		cout<<"NO";
	return 0;
}
